articles.author: Cody Atkinson
articles.title: They've had very different paths to the Australian Open final. So can Danielle Collins crash Ash Barty's party? - ABC News
articles.description: Australia's Ash Barty is one win away from history and her third grand slam title. The world number one has been almost flawless so far but her hard-hitting opponent, American Danielle Collins, will be looking to make history of her own, writes Cody Atkinson.
articles.content:
Amid a turning of the tides at the top of women's tennis, a local hero looks to become the shining beacon of the sport.
After five years of the most even competition at the top end of women's tennis… [+9498 chars]
